Kalambatittha：A vihāra in Ceylon．In it once lived fifty monks who agreed on the full-moon day of āsālha not to talk to each other until they became arahants．Their goal was reached within a month （DA．i．190； SA．iii．155； SnA．i．57； VibhA．353； MA．i．209f）．



This vihāra is very probably identical with Galambatittha （q．v．）．
